attacks.name: Zombie Summon
attacks.description: Perform a regular attack. On use, summon a Zombie Hand that attacks for 42 damage.

attacks.name: Zombie Summon
attacks.description: Performs a regular attack, then summons a Zombie Hand that attacks for 42 damage.

attacks.name: Zephyr Strike
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times for ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage each. If your Accuracy Rating is higher than 20K then this attack can't miss.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times for <damage> damage each. If your Accuracy Rating is higher than 20K then this attack <canMiss>.

attacks.name: Cold Snap
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times for ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage each (Can miss). On a hit, gives the enemy +${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times for <damage> damage each (<CanMiss>). On a hit, <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Avalanche
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage each (Can miss). On a hit, puts the enemy to sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times dealing <damage> damage each (<CanMiss>). On a hit, <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Ignite
attacks.description: Attack once dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage (Can miss). On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's current hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack once dealing <damage> damage (<CanMiss>). On a hit, <hitEffect>.

monsters.name: Magic Golbin
monsters.description: A stinky golbin that practices the dark arts.

monsters.name: Hobgolbin
monsters.description: An ugly, smelly creature that even golbins stay away from.

monsters.name: Sandy Devil
monsters.description: Nothing worse than getting sand in your eyes.

monsters.name: Lost Monkey
monsters.description: If only I had a banana...

items.name: Amulet of Occults
items.customDescription: Reduces the Body Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as an Amulet (Cost cannot go below 1). -5% Summoning Attack Interval and +5% Chance to preserve Summoning Charges

items.name: Sand
items.customDescription: Sandy.

items.name: Staff of Dust
items.customDescription: Reduces the Air and Earth Rune costs of Magic Spells by 1 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Monkey Dung
items.customDescription: Disgustingly useless.

items.name: Dust Imbued Wand
items.customDescription: Reduces the Air and Earth Rune costs of Magic Spells by 3 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Mystic Dust Staff
items.customDescription: Reduces the Air and Earth Rune costs of Magic Spells by 3 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Dust Battlestaff
items.customDescription: Reduces the Air and Earth Rune costs of Magic Spells by 2 when equipped as a Weapon.

items.name: Mysterious Tome
items.customDescription: The cover of this battered tome is inscribed with runes of the four elements. Its pages are filled largely indecipherable glyphs and schemes, but for one, written in Melvorian, which reads: 'Seek the Sanctuary of our people.'
